title: Paper Portal Configuration
description: Configuration file for Paper Portal, which manages WiFi connectivity and device settings.

wifi.description: WiFi network connection settings for the Paper Portal device.

ssid.description: The SSID (network name) of the WiFi network to connect to.

password.description: The password for the WiFi network. For WPA2-PSK and WPA3-Personal networks, this is the pre-shared key.

driver.description: Display backend to use. If omitted, defaults to 'fastepd'.
